data.fullContent: Technology will provide the future of education. Technology improves education at all levels. It has become commonplace to see tablets, computers, and similar tools used in the classroom. These technological tools provide students with access to so much more material than their predecessors had access to. This increase in information and ease of access to materials opens young learners' minds to a vast educational experience. Students are finding new ways to learn from the computers that their schools provide them. It has been found that students who use interactive video or computer programs tend to retain more information. Another massive improvement via technology in education is an increase in communication between educators.

q1.translation: 技术将为教育提供未来。技术改善了各个层次的教育。在教室里看到平板电脑、电脑和类似的工具已经很常见了。这些技术工具为学生们提供了比他们的前辈们更多的资料。信息的增加和获取材料的便利为年轻学习者打开了广阔的教育体验的大门。
q1.front: Technology will provide the future of education. Technology improves education at all levels. It has become commonplace to see tablets, computers, and similar tools used in the classroom. These technological tools provide students with access to so much more material than their predecessors had access to. This increase in information and ease of access to materials opens young learners' minds to a vast educational experience.

This ____ in information and ease of ____ to materials opens young learners' minds ____ a vast educational experience.

q2.translation: 技术将为教育提供未来。技术改善了各个层次的教育。在教室里看到平板电脑、电脑和类似的工具已经很常见了。这些技术工具为学生们提供了比他们的前辈们更多的资料。信息的增加和获取材料的便利为年轻学习者打开了广阔的教育体验的大门。学生们正在寻找从学校提供的电脑中学习的新方法。人们发现，使用交互式视频或计算机程序的学生往往能记住更多的信息。教育技术的另一个巨大进步是教育者之间交流的增加。

options.sentence: Online education startups are growing rapidly because they can help students find the best school for them based on their interests and goals.

The current education system is not enough for everyone because there are so many different kinds of students and they all have different needs.
The increase of technology allows students to have access to more material and information than ever before, which can help them learn more efficiently.
